Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran scored 67 runs to help West Indies go 2-0 up in the five-match T20I series against India.
West Indies won the match by two wickets with seven balls to spare.
Tilak Varma scored his maiden T20I half-century, ending on 51 from 41 balls.
Hardik Pandya was the pick of the Indian bowlers with 3-35 from his four overs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Providence under steaming sunshine and watched by more than 2000 fans.
West Indies encountered some hiccups in their chase of 153 but managed to secure the win.
The third T20I will be played at Providence on Tuesday from 10:30h local time.
